body:
@allenlavoie Yeah, you're right. I understand that just setting the line to `reuse` would disable inheriting from the scope that was passed in. Therefore, for `variable_scope`, `None` should not be the same as `False`. But it will change too many things if we change the meaning of `None`.
Maybe the best we can do for it is to add a line of comment for this issue. Thank you two for your quick responses.
